The claim was published on Facebook on M: 2019, and has been shared more than 11,000 times.
The Thai: language caption in the post included statistics data from the Bank of Thailand, which was used to support the claim.
The senior director of the Bank of Thail: s corporate communications department, Sureeratana Luckananit, confirmed via email that the bank is not the source of the purported data and that the claim is false.
A keyword search on the Bank of Thailand: s website's statistics section yielded no results related to living expenses in retirement.
